Articles.Content:
Cool video I saw today. IT is alwayss the small things that you don't think about that amaze me in space.

http://msnvideo.msn.com/?channelindex=4&from=en-us_msnhpvidmod#/video/0a4384fd-02ff-c48a-eae0-9b644c1bc5f0
I'm kind of wondering whether those drops flying off aren't a problem. Doensn't seem like something you'd want aboard a craft full of electronics and fragile stuff.

I'm kind of wondering whether those drops flying off aren't a problem. Doensn't seem like something you'd want aboard a craft full of electronics and fragile stuff.

Yeah, that exact thought has gone through my head every time someone on the ISS has made a video with micro-grav water. I'm sure precautions were taken but could you imagine pellets of water or a basketball sized sphere swooshing through all of those wires?

I can!
